item.title: Generative Semi-supervised Graph Anomaly Detection
item.description: GGAD: Generative Semi-supervised Graph Anomaly Detection significantly outperforms existing methods by using a novel approach to generate pseudo-anomaly nodes for training, leveraging asymmetric local…
